scripts.install:all: npm --prefix server install && npm --prefix client install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n SERVER,CLIENT -c cyan,magenta "npm --prefix server run dev" "npm --prefix client run dev"
scripts.build: npm --prefix server run build && npm --prefix client run build
scripts.start: concurrently -n SERVER,CLIENT -c cyan,magenta "npm --prefix server run start" "npm --prefix client run preview"
scripts.db:setup: npm --prefix server run prisma:generate && npm --prefix server run prisma:migrate -- --name init && npm --prefix server run prisma:seed
